_json.gridTitle: Ding...You Are Now Free to Start Focusing in the Classroom
_json.description: draw your attention to POSITIVE behavior!   As chaos ensues within the classroom (and by chaos I mean anything from "getting a  little chatty" to "full on riots"), I look for someone who is doing the right thing.  And then...  DING!  I whack my little bell and the room comes to a screeching halt.  Because: a) They know somebody is about to get awarded a tally and (even if they were the one go-go dancing on a desk they still hold a flicker of) hope that it will be their name c...
